contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|Alabama}} {{TOCright}} '''[[Alabama]]''' is a southern state in the United States. '''Alabama''' may also refer to: ==Education== * [[The University of Alabama]], A public university established in 1831 in the State of Alabama ==Geography== * [[Alabama Port, Alabama]], United States * [[Alabama, New York]], United States * [[Alabama River]], United States ==Music== * [[Alabam (Cowboy Copas song)|"Alabam" (Cowboy Copas song)]], a 1960 country song by Cowboy Copas * [[Alabama (John Coltrane song)|"Alabama" (John Coltrane song)]], a 1963 composition by John Coltrane that appears on the album ''Live at Birdland'' *"Alabama", a song on the 1972 album, [[Harvest (Neil Young album)|''Harvest'' (Neil Young album)]] *"Alabama," an EP by underground band CHN * [[Alabama (band)|''Alabama'' (band)]], a country rock music band * [[Alabama (Canadian band)|''Alabama'' (Canadian band)]], a band of the early 1970s ==People== * [[Alabama (people)]], a Native American group ** [[Alabama language]], spoken by the Alabama people ==Ships== * [[CSS Alabama|CSS ''Alabama'']], a confederate cruiser * [[USS Alabama|USS ''Alabama'']], any of several U.S. Navy ships * [[MV Maersk Alabama]], the merchant ship involved in a 2009 piracy incident ==Sports== *[[Alabama Crimson Tide]], the name of any one of 21 varsity sports teams representing The University of Alabama ==Other== * [[Alabama (moth)|''Alabama'' (moth)]], a genus of noctuid moths * Alabama (district), one of 9 military districts of [[Louisiana (New France)]] ==See also== *{{lookfrom|Alabama}} {{disambig}}
